text_block_list.text:
Successfully reaching "The Palace of Oberon", the party 
stepped into a dim blue cave, illuminated by the moonlight.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ………! So this is Oberon's Palace, the end of the journey…!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Amazing……! The walls really do be glowing blue!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
It's like another world…… 
I never expected to see a place like this……!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Hmm? These tracks……?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Hey, over there……! It's too dark to see 
clearly, but that thing on the pedestal―

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Thaaa… That's the Dreamstone!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
So that's it…… 
The light of the moon at night really makes it look dreamy.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Yes, yes……! Thanks, Rob Roy! 
I feel very special right now!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: No, I should be thanking everyone……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
… Apparently the "Dreamstone" is based on an ore 
called "Rhodonite," like the main character's name.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
It's known as the ore of fraternity.…… One that can only 
be found through the ties of the diverse villagers.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: The ties of a diverse group……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Do you remember? 
In "Rhodonite and the Dreamstone"—

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
The wise villager analyzed the map, the brave paved the way, 
the strong defeated the spirits, the kind supported everyone, 
and the calm brought together.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: If even 1 was missing, they would never reach the Dreamstone.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Most of the traps on the way to this palace were 
physically impossible to solve alone.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
I believe the person who built this place… 
They must have also wished for everyone to unite.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I see… Yes, that's right! Like just earlier, Taiki gathered 
information, and Rob Roy deciphered it…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
If Dober didn't stop us we would've simply 
gone back to the tree house and leeeft!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
That's right! Thinking about it like that, 
we gathered just the right people, didn't we?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
(… Honestly, at the start I thought this would be 
nothing more than a vicarious experience, 
and I was happy enough with that, but—)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
(All those places we've been, all traps we 
overcame together… And most of all—)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
(………I like books, and that's fine. 
…And I'm really happy that I do.)

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Wooooooooooooooooo! 
The last night of our trip calls for a paaartyy!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Are you sure about it, Rob Roy? 
Leaving the Dreamstone there after we finally found it?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
…… There were signs of people visiting the cave. 
Thinking about it, there must be plenty of others 
who realized the link to the story.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
So…… I want to leave the dream for the next "Villagers". 
…… Because the dreams of stories transcend time and space.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
…… I see. Dreams of stories, huh.… Right! Tell me more 
about your favorite books some time, Rob Roy!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Tell El too! I didn't know much about books, but this 
adventure story was super fun and excitiiing!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I-I'd be happy to…!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Say cheese! ……Oww, the battery died! Ahaha! But I got plenty of shots already!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
And I got a lot of fantastic memories at this great place! 
I'm happy I came to this Summer Walk!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
…… I see. You had a lot of fun, didn't you? 
Then I guess that's a goal achieved……

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
A goal achieved…? Oh! 
Did you… bring that pamphlet for me!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? Uhh, umm, well you haven't been back home 
for a long time right? I thought… maybe you could 
use a change of scenery…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's why…… 
I'll have to do my best to stop feeling lonely so easily～

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: …… I don't think you have to.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Really? Why?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I mean… I spoke to Rob Roy earlier. 
She said your pictures brought her joy.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
There are a lot of smiling faces in your pictures. 
Maybe it's because you have a way with people 
that those sorts of smiles naturally come out.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
It was because of your sociable nature that 
we even reached the Dreamstone in the end.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
So I mean, umm…… your loneliness is proof that you 
like people that much. I think that's a great positive.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Loneliness is proof that I like people…? Ahaha!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
You mean I… 
Don't have to worry about feeling lonely! Right?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Let's go somewhere again sometime, Dober!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, I'm the one who got invited again… 
…… But sure. It's a promise.
